text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha tampit khnhom chea mnoussaalok dauch puok anak der kreante ke ban phdal vea hi mk aoy khnhom tha pitabrakd nasa mcheasa robsa puok anak kuchea mcheasa temuoyokt . dau che neah chaur puok anak anouvotd aoy ban troemotrauv champoh trong ning trauv som aphytosa pi trong . haey pheap a nd reay ku samreab puok del thveu shi ri k
